label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshanbase armor increased by 1

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Attack Speednow always continually adjusts based on the latest modifications applied to the unit

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Melee illusions created by aRune of Illusiontake 200% instead of 300% damage

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Random Drafthero selection pool increased from 22 to 24

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Captains Drafthero selection pool increased from 24 to 27 (8 per type to 9)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Captains Draft hero bans increased from 4 to 6

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Meepois no longer available inAbility Draft

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml:
• Aghanim's ScepterBorrowed Timenow redirects 35% of all damage dealt to nearby allied heroes to Abaddon when active
    • Heroes within 900 range of Abaddon will have their damage redirected

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml: • Chilling Touchattack speed reduction increased from -15 to -20

label: Anti-Mage
descriptionHtml: • Mana Voidarea of effect increased from 450 to 500

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Counter Helixnow usesPseudo Randomchance
    • This reduces the chances that a very unlucky or lucky streak of procs occurs

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml: • Flaming Lassomana cost increased from 150 to 225

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml: • Base damage increased by 4

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Bloodragecast point improved from 0.6 to 0.4
  • Bloodrage can no longer bedispelled
    • Using abilities likeMantaorBKBwill not remove the Silence

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml: • Trackcast range increased from 900/1050/1200 to 1200

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• If you have not attacked for 10 seconds, your next attack will always activate aDrunken Brawlercritical hit
  • If you have not been attacked for 10 seconds, Drunken Brawler will cause you toevadethe next attack
    • This mechanic carries over to yourFire Spiritwhen it has the passive via Aghanim Scepter

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml:
• Warpathno longer has unique values for the first movement speed stack
    • First stack bonus was 5%/7%/10% movement speed (It now does the same as all stacks)
  • Warpath movement speed stack bonus increased from 1/2/3% to 3/4/5%
    • Old Level 1: 5%➜9%
    • Old Level 3: 10%➜28%
    • New Level 1: 3%➜15%
    • New Level 3: 5%➜35%

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml:
• Spiderling'sPoison Stingdamage per second increased from 4 to 8
  • Spin Web's free pathing no longer deactivates when enemy has vision on Broodmother
  • Spin Web's free pathing is now disabled for 3 seconds when Broodmother takes damage
    • Uses the same damage source rules asBlink Dagger
  • Insatiable Hungerlifestealincreased from 40/60/80% to 60/80/100%

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml: • Hoof Stompmana cost increased from 85/100/115/130 to 130

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml: • Phantasmnow has a 50% chance to create one extraillusionwhen cast

label: Chen
descriptionHtml: • Penitencecooldown reduced from 14 to 14/13/12/11

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml: • Death Pactcooldown reduced from 45 to 45/40/35

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml:
• Poison Touchno longer causes aministun
    • This only removes the instant ministun at the start
    • The debuff will still stun the target when the poison sets in at level 4

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml: • Kinetic Fieldcooldown reduced from 14 to 14/13/12/11

label: Doom
descriptionHtml:
• Doomdamage no longer ignoresmagic shields
    • Applies to shields such as the barrier fromPipe of Insight

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml: • Gustknockback duration increased from 0.2 to 0.5

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Stone Remnantrecharge time reduced from 35 to 30

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml:
• Creepsno longer try to path aroundFissure; they will wait for it to disappear
  • Echo Slamno longer ignores units that areinvisibleor inFog of War

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Echo Stompmana cost reduced from 100/115/130/145 to 100
  • Echo Stomp physical and magical damage increased from 80 to 80/85/90/95 each

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Searing Chainsduration reduced from 2/2/3/3 to 1/2/2/3
    • Total damage is still 80/120/240/300
  • Sleight of Fistbonus damage reduced from 30/60/90/120 to 20/40/60/80

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml: • Untouchableslow duration increased from 3 to 4

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml: • Midnight Pulsearea of effect increased from 400 to 600

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Baseagilityincreased from 21 to 23
  • Turn rateimproved from 0.5 to 1

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml:
• Homing Missilenow hitsinvisibleunits
  • Homing Missile hits required to destroy increased from 3 to 3/3/4/5

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml: • Burning Spearis no longer aUnique Attack Modifier

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• Ghost Walkslow no longer affectsmagic immuneenemies
  • EMPdelay increased from 2.6 to 2.9

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml:
• Dual Breathrange increased by 50
  • Liquid Firelevel 4 cooldown reduced from 5 to 4
  • Aghanim's ScepterMacropyreduration increased from 7 to 14
  • Aghanim's Scepter Macropyre range increased from 1350 to 1800
    • Unupgraded is still 900

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml: • Base attack timeimproved from 1.6 to 1.5

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Scepter upgrade: Provides permanentSpirit Form
    • Additionally, the following effects are active during the day: Keeper of the Light gainsunobstructed visionandIlluminateheals allies for 75% of the damage values

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• Torrentarea of effect increased from 215 to 225
  • X Marks The Spotcan now last twice as long on allied heroes
  • Ghost Shipallied buff duration increased from 8 to 10
  • Add Ghost Ship AOE indicator for allies

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml:
• Overwhelming Oddsbonus damage per hero is increased from 14/16/18/20 to 20/35/50/65
    • Per creep is still 14/16/18/20
  • Overwhelming Odds area of effect increased from 315 to 330
  • Overwhelming Odds base damage rescaled from 50/100/150/200 to 60/100/140/180
  • Moment of Couragenow usesPseudo Randomchance
    • This reduces the chances that a very unlucky or lucky streak of procs occurs

label: Leshrac
descriptionHtml: • Lightning Stormnow slows its targets by 75% for 0.5 seconds

label: Lich
descriptionHtml:
• Frost Armorcan now be cast onbuildings
  • Aghanim's ScepterChain Frostno longer has a bounce limit

label: Lina
descriptionHtml:
• Attack rangeincreased from 650 to 670
  • Aghanim's Scepter Laguna Blade damage goes throughmagic immunity
    • Damage can still be reduced by normalspell resistance

label: Lion
descriptionHtml: • Hexcooldown reduced from 30/25/20/15 to 30/24/18/12

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml: • Spirit Bearhealth regeneration increased from 2 to 2/3/4/5

label: Luna
descriptionHtml: • Baseagilityreduced from 22 to 18

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml: • Shapeshiftno longer provides 100/200/300 bonus health

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml:
• RemovedSkewermaximum target limit
  • Skewer range increased from 600/800/1000/1200 to 750/900/1050/1200

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml:
• Split Shotreworked from 50/60/70/80% damage with 5 maximum targets, to 80% damage with 2/3/4/5 maximum targets
  • Mystic Snakeno longer requiresFog of Warvision to bounce
  • Mana Shielddamage absorption per mana increased from 1/1.5/2/2.5 to 1.6/1.9/2.2/2.5

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml: • Basemovement speedincreased from 305 to 315

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml: • Sacred Arrowvision reduced from 800 to 650

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml:
• Mirror Imageillusiondamage dealt reduced from 30/35/40/45% to 20/25/30/35%
  • Rip Tidearea of effect reduced from 350 to 320
  • Rip Tide negative armor no longer goes throughmagic immunity

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml:
• Heartstopper Auraarea of effect increased from 1000 to 1200
  • Reaper's Scythenow adds +30% duration to the respawn timer

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml: • Darknessnow also affects the vision ofbuildings

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Impalecooldown increased from 11 to 13
  • Impale can no longer be blocked byLinken's Sphere

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor increased by 1
  • Cast animation improved from 0.56 to 0.45

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml:
• Purificationarea of effect increased from 225 to 240
  • Repelno longer removes positive buffs from allies
    • This means that Repel will no longer remove Guardian Angel
  • Guardian Angelduration increased from 5/6/7 to 6/7/8
  • Aghanim's Scepter Guardian Angel duration increased from 5/6/7 to 8/9/10

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Stifling Daggercooldown reduced from 8 to 6
  • Blurevasionchance increased from 20/25/30/40% to 20/30/40/50%

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml:
• Icarus Divecast point extended from 0.01 to 0.2
  • Fire Spiritsdamage reduced from 15/35/55/75 to 10/30/50/70
  • Fire Spirits health cost increased from 15% to 20%

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Decrepifymana cost reduced from 100 to 60
  • Nether Wardduration increased from 25 to 30

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml:
• Shadow Strikecooldown reduced from 20/16/12/8 to 16/12/8/4
  • Shadow Strike cast range increased from 400 to 435

label: Razor
descriptionHtml:
• Strengthgain increased from 1.7 to 2.3
  • Unstable Currentslow duration increased from 0.4/0.8/1.2/1.6 to 0.5/1/1.5/2

label: Riki
descriptionHtml: • Backstabnow works when attacking allied units

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml: • Added Aghanim's Scepter upgrade:Demonic Purgecooldown replaced with two charges that have a 40 second replenish time

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml: • Requiem of Souls' secondary debuff now affectsmagic immuneunits

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml:
• Agilitygrowth increased from 2.1 to 3.0
  • Curse of the Silentcooldown reduced from 20/18/16/14 to 20/16/12/8

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Basemovement speedincreased from 315 to 325
  • Concussive Shotdamage increased from 50/100/150/200 to 60/120/180/240

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml:
• Fixed Sniper's acquisition range not matching his maximum attack range
    • This affects his ability to auto attack units at his maximum range

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml:
• Nether Strikecast range increased from 400/550/700 to 700
    • Scepter range increased from 550/700/850 to 850
  • Nether Strike cooldown rebalanced from 75 to 80/70/60

label: Sven
descriptionHtml: • Base damage increased by 6

label: Templar Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Psionic Trapsub-ability now has the same cast point as the ability on the trap itself
    • Previously the sub-ability and the ability on the trap had different cast behaviors (both zero now)

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Strengthgain reduced from 1.9 to 1.4
  • Reflectionslow no longer persists throughmagic immunity
  • Reflection duration rebalanced from 5 to 2.5/3.5/4.5/5.5

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml:
• Anchor Smashdamage reduction increased from 40% to 60%
  • Anchor Smash now works onAncient creeps
    • Still does not affectRoshan

label: Tinker
descriptionHtml: • Heat Seeking Missileis no longer blocked byEthereal

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml: • Craggy Exteriorstun duration rescaled from 1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 to 1/1.25/1.5/1.75

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml: • Melee Whirling Axescast point improved from 0.2 to 0

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedSnowballinto a two-part ability: one which creates the snowball, and a sub-ability to launch the snowball
    • You have up to 4 seconds to use the sub-ability
    • The area that automatically pulls allies in has been reduced

label: Undying
descriptionHtml:
• Soul Riparea of effect increased from 975 to 1300
  • TombstoneZombieDeathlust's Max% health threshold increased from 5/10/15/20% to 20/25/30/35%
  • Tombstone Zombies no longer give anyexperienceorgold
    • Down from 25 experience and 5-7 gold
  • Tombstone Bounty increased from 70/90/110/130 to 75/100/125/150
  • Flesh Golem's Plague Aura now affectsmagic immuneunits

label: Ursa
descriptionHtml: • Fury Swipesis no longer aUnique Attack Modifier

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• When Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer is inflicted with a negativeVengeance Aura, which decreases the damage of her killer and their nearby allies, until she revives
    • The damage reduction is based on Vengeful Spirit's Vengeance Aura level, and has a 900 range area of effect around Vengeful Spirit's killer

label: Visage
descriptionHtml: • Grave Chillcooldown increased from 10 to 16/14/12/10

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:
• Shadow Wordduration increased from 9 to 11
  • Upheavalcooldown reduced from 50 to 50/46/42/38

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml:
• ActivatingWindrunnow disjoints incoming attack projectiles
  • Aghanim's ScepterFocus Firedamage reduction decreased from -50/-40/-30 to -30/-15/0, and no longer has special rules for procs

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml:
• Maledictcooldown reduced from 35 to 20
  • Death Wardbase attack time improved from 0.25 to 0.22

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• Mortal Strikedamage ratio increased from 1.25/1.75/2.25/2.75 to 1.5/2/2.5/3
  • Base armor reduced by 1.

label: Zeus
descriptionHtml:
• Arc Lightningcast point improved from 0.4 to 0.2
  • Lightning Bolttrue sightrange reduced from 900 to 750
  • Lightning Boltflying visionrange reduced from 1000 to 750
  • Lightning Bolt can now be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in a 250 range

label: Animal Courier
descriptionHtml: • Ground Courier respawn time reduced from 180 seconds to 140 seconds

label: Bloodstone
descriptionHtml: • Bloodpactheal increased from 400 HP + 30 HP/charge to 500 HP + 30 HP/charge

label: Clarity
descriptionHtml: • Mana regeneration from 100 over 30 seconds to 135 over 40 seconds

label: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
descriptionHtml:
• Cyclonenow deals 50 damage to enemy units when they land
  • You can now cast Cyclone on yourself while you aremagic immune

label: Manta Style
descriptionHtml:
• Mirror Imagenow resets the current attack and spell targeting priority
    • Also affects other image shuffle based spells likeChaos Knight'sPhantasmandNaga Siren'sMirror Image

label: Mjollnir
descriptionHtml:
• Chain Lightningdamage reduced from 160 to 150
  • Static Shock area of effect is now centered around the unit with theStatic Charge, rather than around the attacker
  • Fixed Chain Lightning not functioning properly when it procs while a previous proc is still bouncing
    • This affectsMaelstromandMjollnirand makes them more reliable when they proc in sequence

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml:
• Necronomicon Warrior's movement speed rescaled from 330/360/390 to 350
  • NecronomiconunitsXPbounty increased from 59 to 100/150/200

label: Observer Ward
descriptionHtml:
• Sharing wards with allies now requires a Control key override
    • If you hold Control, using a ward will only target heroes
    • If you do not, you may only target the ground
  • Wards can no longer be placed in thefountainareas

label: Pipe of Insight
descriptionHtml:
• Pipe health regeneration reduced from 11 to 8
  • Pipe now providesInsight Aura, which grants 4 health regeneration to nearby allies
  • Pipe's active buff is no longerdispellable

label: Rod of Atos
descriptionHtml: • Crippleability cooldown reduced from 12 to 10

label: Scythe of Vyse
descriptionHtml:
• Hexedunit base movement speed increased from 100 to 140
    • This only affects Scythe of Vyse

label: Shadow Amulet
descriptionHtml:
• Fadeno longer requires the target to remain stationary
    • Invisibility still requires the target to remain stationary

label: Shadow Blade
descriptionHtml: • Shadow Walkduration increased from 12 to 14

label: Town Portal Scroll
descriptionHtml: • Added an option to require a halt command to in order to cancel a Town Portal Scroll
